DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine 14-19 year old African American adolescent able take daily vitamin D supplement daily 4 month well daily dose 400 IU 2000 IU vitamin D supplement raise vitamin D blood level .
DOC.detailed_description: To determine feasibility African American teenager take daily vitamin D supplement 4 month period term compliance practical implementation . To determine difference response blood 25-OH D level randomly assign take 400 IU supplement versus 2000 IU per day determine difference blood 25-OH D level response depend subject gender overweight/obese versus healthy-weight status .
DOC.criteria: Healthy African American Adolescents Hypertension Pregnancy Medications affect study outcome measure Use vitamin and/or mineral supplement herbal supplement Individuals race
